org.apache.juneau.rest

Class ClientVersionMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.RestMatcher
      • org.apache.juneau.rest.ClientVersionMatcher

  • public class ClientVersionMatcher
extends RestMatcher
    Specialized matcher for matching client versions.
    See Also:
    • Overview > juneau-rest-server > Client Versioning

      Constructors

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean matches(RestRequest req)
      Returns true if the specified request matches this matcher.

      Returns true if this matcher is required to match in order for the method to be invoked.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientVersionMatcher

        protected ClientVersionMatcher(String clientVersionHeader,
                               Method javaMethod)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        clientVersionHeader - The HTTP request header name containing the client version. If null or an empty string, uses "X-Client-Version"
        javaMethod - The version string that the client version must match.

      • matches

      • mustMatch

        public boolean mustMatch()
        Description copied from class: RestMatcher
        Returns true if this matcher is required to match in order for the method to be invoked.

        If false, then only one of the matchers must match.

        Overrides:
        mustMatch in class RestMatcher
        Returns:
        true if this matcher is required to match in order for the method to be invoked.
